review: Remember back when Gmail came out and it was 10x better than annoy other email service available? Those days are over. Now we get products that are lacking some of the most important features. (E.g. Google Voice with no MMS) You can't stream your own media to it, so it's just something they use to get a kickback from the subscriptions you're paying for, AND you can't navigate Netflix or anything on the TV...you have to do it from your phone, iPad, or laptop, and stream it to the TV from there. Ugh...why do I even BOTHER with Google anymore? I know it's just going to fizzle away and they're going to drop support for it. Stupid purchase...I should have known better.
